item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Local 121 on Washington St. in downtown Providence.

For better or worse, Fall is officially here, and what better place to hang out for a few hours then at Local 121? Amazing dark wood paneling with incredible detail grace the entire bar area coupled with the old-world charm of herald painted stained glass windows. It is truly a feast for the eyes! Plus the restaurant side is very trendy and known for their locally grown eclectic mix of gourmet fare and house-created drink concoctions.

Can it be true!!!??? We haven't been to Local 121 for an MNM in over a year!? Well its high time we go then!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a blue messenger bag with me, but we're hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Local 121!
